mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, TO_CHAR(STUDY_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS STUDY_START_DATE , STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,USER_ID,USER_NICKNAME, LIKE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT S.STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, STUDY_START_DATE, STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, S.USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,U.USER_ID,U.USER_NICKNAME, LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_USERS U RIGHT JOIN TBL_STUDY_BOARD S ON U.USER_NUMBER = S.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT STUDY_NUMBER AS STUDY_LIKE, COUNT(STUDY_NUMBER) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_LIKE GROUP BY STUDY_NUMBER ) ON S.STUDY_NUMBER = STUDY_LIKE ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, TO_CHAR(STUDY_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS STUDY_START_DATE , STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,USER_ID,USER_NICKNAME FROM (SELECT STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, STUDY_START_DATE, STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, S.USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,U.USER_ID,U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_STUDY_BOARD S JOIN TBL_USERS U ON S.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY STUDY_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

select CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_END_DATE, CLASS_PROCESS, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_ADDRESS, CLASS_LEVEL, USER_NUMBER, USER_NAME, USER_LEVEL, APPLY_EDUCATION from (SELECT CB.CLASS_NUMBER, CB.CLASS_TITLE, CB.CLASS_START_DATE, CB.CLASS_END_DATE, CB.CLASS_PROCESS, CB.CLASS_PRICE, CB.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB.CLASS_LEVEL, CB.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_LEVEL, MA.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD CB JOIN TBL_USERS U ON CB.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMTO_APPLY MA ON U.USER_NUMBER = MA.USER_NUMBER WHERE class_level = '2' ORDER BY CLASS_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
